Do not exert excessive traction on the cord while performing CCT. Do not repeat the 
manoeuvre more than once.
/circle6 As the placenta delivers, hold it with both hands to prevent tearing of the membranes. 
Normally, the placenta delivers within fi ve minutes of the birth of the baby if the third 
stage of labour is managed actively.
/circle6 If the membranes do not slip out spontaneously, gently turn the placenta so that the 
membranes are twisted into a rope and move them up and down
